casebody.data:
Orlando C. Smith et al. v. Charles F. Burton, guardian. Mandamus to compel payment. ■Julian G. Dickinson for tbe motion.

Mandamus does not die to compel a guardian to pay a claim against his ward which the probate court has adjudged valid; the proceeding must he by action.

Motion for order to sllow cause.

Submitted and denied June 13.
